documentation.title: Assignment In Ternary Condition
documentation.standard: Checks that variable assignment does not occur in conditional statement of ternary. Condition must be in parentheses to be checked; Ternaries lacking parentheses around condition are skipped. If incorrect will throw: "Variable assignment found within a condition. Did you mean to do a comparison?"

code.title: Valid: Variable assigned with comparison in parentheses.
Invalid: Parentheses used but variable assignment instead of comparison.
